description technical detail:
Viewsonic 27" DVI, VGA FULL HD Widescreen Monitor
The ViewSonic VA2746-LED is a 27" (27" viewable) widescreen monitor with a LED backlight and a glossy, thin-bezel design ideal for use in the home or office. With Full HD 1920 x 1080 resolution and a 20M:1 MEGA dynamic contrast ratio, the VA2746-LED delivers stunning brightness and contrast, while a quick 3.4 ms response time ensures stunning image quality for both home and office. VGA and DVI inputs provide flexible and convenient connectivity, while a VESA-mountable design offers additional mount flexibility. With an efficient LED backlight and energy-saving eco mode, the VA2746-LED is an environmentally friendly display choice.
